client.map.view.mapState

Interface IMapState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NormalState, RoadBuilderState, RoadSetupState, SettlementSetupState

    public interface IMapState
    The map state handles what the map should do in special cases, for instance during setup when a settlement and road should be placed consecutively.
    Author:
    Jonathan Sadler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Boolean AllowCancel()
      Returns if the current state allows cancelling placement.
      IMapState GetNextMapState()
      Gets the next state after the completion of the current state.
      PieceType GetPieceType()
      Gets the piece type associated with the current state.
      java.lang.Boolean IsSetup()
      Returns if the current state is a map setup state.

    • Method Detail

      • GetPieceType

        PieceType GetPieceType()
        Gets the piece type associated with the current state.
        Returns:
        The current piece type.

      • GetNextMapState

        IMapState GetNextMapState()
        Gets the next state after the completion of the current state.
        Returns:
        The next state object.

      • IsSetup

        java.lang.Boolean IsSetup()
        Returns if the current state is a map setup state.
        Returns:
        True if yes, else false.

      • AllowCancel

        java.lang.Boolean AllowCancel()
        Returns if the current state allows cancelling placement.
        Returns:
        True if yes, else false.
